props.title: Function Parameters and Return Values
props.question: What is the primary purpose of function parameters?
options: To decorate the function with colors
To pass input values to a function so it can use them in its logic
To specify how many times the function runs
To determine the name of the function
props.explanation: Function parameters allow you to pass data into a function, making it flexible and reusable for different inputs. They are the variables listed in the function definition.
